com.giift.sdk.data

Class Currency

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.giift.sdk.data.Currency
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.provider.BaseColumns

    public abstract class Currency
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.provider.BaseColumns
    A currency is basically the link between a iso code and the corresponding symbol. It is mostly used in the user settings dropdown, so that the user can select his reference currency. Currency instances are available in the GiiftProvider

        @Nullable
public static android.net.Uri BuildUriFromCode(@NonNull
                                                         android.content.Context context,
                                                         @NonNull
                                                         java.lang.String code)
        Build a uri to access a currency line from the content provider
        Parameters:
        context - used to build the base content uri
        code - ISO code of the currency
        Returns:
        uri to access the currency in the ContentProvider

      • GetCodeFromUri

        @Nullable
public static java.lang.String GetCodeFromUri(@NonNull
                                                        android.net.Uri uri)
        Deconstruct a uri to extract the currency code
        Parameters:
        uri - uri to be deconstructed
        Returns:
        currency code if the uri is valid, null otherwise
